presentation.text1: Virtual-me n'est pas un portfolio. C'est un laboratoire, un support d'apprentissage, de veille technologique, et de communication.
presentation.text2: Un chat, connecté, fullstack javascript, original, opensource, un cv, un délire, dynamique, une API, mulitlingue, responsive, accessible, amusant, critiquable, testable, sécurisé, dockerisé, sur Github, gratuit

JUNIOR.name: débutant
JUNIOR.description: Connaissances de base - moins de 2 ans d'experience professionelle

SENIOR.name: expert
SENIOR.description: Maitrise du sujet - plus de 4 ans d'experience professionelle, capacité à encadrer

A1.description: Beginner - Can understand and use familiar everyday expressions

A2.description: Elementary - Can understand sentences and frequently used expressions related to areas of most immediate relevance

B1.description: Intermediate - Can understand the main points of clear standard input on familiar matters regularly encountered in work, school, leisure, etc.

B2.description: Upper Intermediate - Can understand the main ideas of complex text on both concrete and abstract topics, including technical discussions in his/her field of specialisation. Can interact with a degree of fluency and spontaneity that makes regular interaction with native speakers possible

C1.description: Advanced - Can understand a wide range of demanding, longer texts, and recognise implicit meaning. Can express him/herself fluently and spontaneously without much obvious searching for expressions. Can use language flexibly and effectively for social, academic and professional purposes.

C2.description: Proficiency - Can understand with ease virtually everything heard or read. Can summarise information from different spoken and written sources, reconstructing arguments and accounts in a coherent presentation. Can express him/herself spontaneously, very fluently and precisely, differentiating finer shades of meaning even in more complex situations.
